attributes.action: I want the government to introduce nasal vaccines.
attributes.additional_details: The government ought to accommodate the personal requirements of individuals and it should go without saying that there are millions of people in this country and the world who have an intense fear of injections that can't simply be overcome through willpower alone.
attributes.background: I want the government to make nasal covid vaccines available to members of the public who have an intense apathy and fear of injections.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

The development of vaccines is a matter for medical researchers and pharmaceutical companies, not the Government or House of Commons. As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.
